scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec NODE_ENV=development ELASTICSEARCH_URL=http://localhost:8001/api/v1/namespaces/default/services/elasticsearch:9200/proxy GRAPHQL_PORT=8007 GNOMAD_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac REDIS_HOST=localhost babel-node --config-file=../../babel.config.js src/server.js
